name: Variable's Love Story
description:
We can't finish the game until now.But we did it very happily this time,so we still decided to publish.And there is a uncompleted version,even if it can't be played.Please forgive us,but you can still get in the game to "play" somehow...
Wish we can finish it later.

This is a puzzle,story and code game. In an endless code loop, there is a couple of variables who love each other. You have to break this loop and let the couple stay together for a long time.

AD or Arrow Left Right to move variable.W or space is jump.S is enter the chunks.
